Reviews.Title: “Great location, clean hotel, good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Kate1978
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights april hotel location stones throw times square slap bang middle manhattan cleaned day bar site plenty restaurants nearby safe location handy walk north central park walk south lower manhattan staff helpful spent little time matter showers powerful clean recommend hotel pay odds prices happy basic accommodation

Reviews.Title: “It is what it is - a nicely decorated budget hotel”

Reviews.Content: positives location fantastic located 47th east 7th times square probably couple hundred feet street rates location stay chain marriott hilton starwood etc youll definitely paying stay 40 lobby chic little cold loud music modern style sort appeals neutral youve stayed marriott marquis hilton times square probably 12 13 size rates expected tv nice lot channels channel guide nice radioalarm wifi fancy voip phone toiletries iron hair dryer luggage rack nice nicely decorated black furniture nice touch black desk scratched closet door ac tad loud terribly fine echoing previous reviews yes elevator tiny slow time walked steps 2 sets fire doors hall annoyances include outlets desk literally desk height move desk wall outlet bed nightstand top particular outlets tied switch bed didnt realize power minute figure switch minor annoyance figure front desk staff disappointment duty didnt acknowledge walked window 20 efficient polite eye contact inconveniencing supposed aloof found bit offputting random observation website touts loccitane toiletries ecofriendly brand dont recall top head read reviews found august 2009 saying replaced summer website updated corrected quick note recommendation clicked yes qualified yes stay business trip probably unless client particularly sensitive cost recommend colleagues probably caveat recommend friendsfamily looking middle action budget dont mind cozy accomodations yes worse wont earn loyalty deal
